thread.title: BRIEF-Global Bridge Capital Files For Offering 7.5 Mln Shares Of Co's Common Stock ‍​

title: BRIEF-Global Bridge Capital Files For Offering 7.5 Mln Shares Of Co's Common Stock ‍​

organizations.name: brief-global bridge capital files for offering 7.5 mln shares of co
min read    global bridge capital inc

text:
30 AM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Global Bridge Capital Files For Offering 7.5 Mln Shares Of Co's Common Stock ‍​ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
March 28 (Reuters) - Global Bridge Capital Inc ( IPO-GBCL.OB ): 
* GLOBAL BRIDGE CAPITAL INC FILES FOR OFFERING 7.5 MILLION SHARES OF CO’S COMMON STOCK - SEC FILING‍​ 
* GLOBAL BRIDGE CAPITAL INC SAYS INTEND TO APPLY TO LIST OUR COMMON STOCK ON THE NEW YORK STOCK EXCHANGE-AMERICAN 
* GLOBAL BRIDGE CAPITAL INC - ‍ALL OF SHARES BEING REGISTERED FOR SALE BY COMPANY WILL BE SOLD AT A FIXED PRICE OF $5 PER SHARE FOR DURATION OF OFFERING​ Source text: [ bit.ly/2us56gP ] Further company coverage:
